titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to carry out a pilot program on the provision of traumatic brain injury care in rural areas.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary: 11/6/2009--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to carry out a five-year pilot program, in five rural states, under which the Secretary trains and then assigns a specific Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) case manager to each veteran diagnosed with traumatic brain injury who is receiving care in a VA facility in that state.
